Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone showing two students using the device to communicate.
The student can include a depiction of the string or wire connecting the two devices.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string from one student to the other.
The student can show how the device works over a distance, highlighting communication between two points.
The student can identify and label any materials used in the design of the string telephone.
